resources.string:
• For both, images and videos, guess the emotion based on how the child enacts it per emotion card. 
 • Hold the phone in landscape mode, such that the screen faces the child and is not visible to you. 
 • For every correct guess, use your left finger to tap the left side of the screen, and for every incorrect guess, use your right finger to tap the right side of the screen. 
 • Capture the child's expression for every emotion card using the 'volume down' button. 
 • Make sure the phone is stable while clicking the picture. 
 • Ensure the volume is set appropriately before you enter into the game session. 
 • During the game, the volume can be adjusted only using 'volume up' button, as 'volume down' will be used as a camera button. 
 • Keep going till the timer stops, and get your score in the end.

\u2022 The expressions you capture during the game get saved to your gallery automatically. \n \u2022 After the game ends, you will see a share button on the next screen, clicking which will take you to the gallery, from where you select the images to be shared. \n \u2022 In case you forget to do this after the game ends, there is also an option in the play area which you may use for the same.
How to Play: Carefully look at the image/video on the screen (with text below it as the hint). Enact the emotion shown by the image/video. Tell your parents if they guessed it right :)
